org.apache.hama.bsp.ft

Class AsyncRcvdMsgCheckpointImpl.CheckpointPeerService<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.ft.AsyncRcvdMsgCheckpointImpl.CheckpointPeerService<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FaultTolerantPeerService<M>, MessageEventListener<M>
    Enclosing class:
    AsyncRcvdMsgCheckpointImpl<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    public static class AsyncRcvdMsgCheckpointImpl.CheckpointPeerService<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements FaultTolerantPeerService<M>, MessageEventListener<M>
    Initializes the peer fault tolerance by checkpointing service. For recovery, on peer initialization, it reads all the checkpointed messages to recover the state of the peer. During normal working, it checkpoints all the messages it received in the previous superstep. It also stores the superstep progress in the global synchronization area.
